doc:
Mathieu Kassovitz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathieu_Kassovitz 0 Mathieu Kassovitz (born 3 August 1967) is a French director, screenwriter, producer, editor, and actor. He is the founder of MNP Entreprise, a film production company. He has won three César Awards: Most Promising Actor for See How They Fall (1994), and Best Film and Best Editing for La Haine (1995). He also received Best Director and Best Writing nominations. Mathieu_Kassovitz ( born 3_August_1967 ) is a_French_director , screenwriter , producer , editor , and actor . He is the_founder of MNP_Entreprise , a_film_production_company . He has_won three_César_Awards : Most_Promising_Actor for See How They Fall (_1994_) , and Best_Film_and_Best_Editing for La_Haine_(_1995_) . He also received Best_Director_and_Best_Writing_nominations .
